title: 115_hr2835
content: PERMANENT LOAN GUARANTEE FEE WAIVERS FOR VETERANS. The Small Business Act is amended to include a guarantee fee waiver for veterans in connection with loans. The Small Business Act is amended to include a guarantee fee waiver for veterans in connection with loans of not more than $150,000 made to a veteran or spouse of a veteran after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment. An exception applies if the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost for the program. The Small Business Act is amended to include a guarantee fee waiver for veterans on loans of up to $150,000 made to a veteran or spouse after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment. The waiver does not apply if the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost for the program. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 made to veterans or their spouses after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment. The waiver does not apply if the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost for the program. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 made to veterans or their spouses after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment. The Administrator may not collect a guarantee fee for express loans to veterans or their spouses. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 made to veterans or their spouses after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment. If the President's budget includes a cost for the program above zero, the requirements for express loans to veterans or their spouses will not apply during that fiscal year.
